item.description:
Letter: Cannan an MP or 'oil industry lobbyist'?
MP Ron Cannan's recent column in the Capital News (Pipeline Energy Projects Offer Economic Opportunities, Aug. 20) praising the economic benefits of this oil pipeline is both premature and highly prejudicial. Cannan supports the project based entirely on ...

item.title: Mentioned by HQ Kelowna
item.description:
Back-to-school tax relief
The Honourable Ron Cannan, Member of Parliament for Kelowna – Lake Country, today reminded students returning to school to take full advantage of the important financial relief available to them. In 2012, students and their families claimed ... “As M.P. for Kelowna – Lake Country, I am proud to say that the investment our Government is making in Canadians who study hard to obtain a post-secondary education will also help maintain Canada's edge in the global marketplace.” Several programs offer tax relief to ...

item.title: Mentioned by CJFW
item.description:
Smithers Dze L K'ant Friendship Centre Receives $25000 Grant
Kelowna-Lake Country MP Ron Cannan was in Smithers on Aug. 19 to announce a $25,000 federal grant to the Dze L K'ant Friendship Centre's Elders Gathering Place. The grant is funded through the New Horizons for Seniors program, which endows ...
